verses.verse: Again the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, 'When<WH3588> a man<WH376> or<WH176> woman<WH802> makes<WH6381> a special<WH6381> vow,<WH5087> the vow<WH5088> of a Nazirite,<WH5139> to dedicate<WH9320> himself to the Lord,<WH3068>

he shall abstain<WH9320> from wine<WH3196> and strong<WH7941> drink;<WH7941> he shall drink<WH7941> no<WH3808> vinegar,<WH2558> whether made from wine<WH3196> or strong<WH7941> drink,<WH8354> neither<WH3808> shall he drink<WH8354> any<WH3605> grape<WH6025> juice,<WH4952> nor<WH3808> eat<WH398> fresh<WH3892> or dried<WH3002> grapes.<WH6025>

'All<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> he shall not eat<WH398> anything<WH4480> <WH3605> that is produced<WH6213> by the grape<WH3196> vine,<WH1612> from [the] seeds<WH2785> even to [the] skin.<WH2085>

'All<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of his vow<WH5088> of separation<WH5145> no<WH3808> razor<WH8593> shall pass<WH5674> over<WH5921> his head.<WH7218> He shall be holy<WH6918> until<WH5704> the days<WH3117> are fulfilled<WH4390> for which<WH834> he separated<WH9320> himself to the Lord;<WH3068> he shall let the locks<WH6545> of hair<WH8181> on his head<WH7218> grow<WH1431> long.<WH1431>
'All<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH9320> to the Lord<WH3068> he shall not go<WH935> near to a dead<WH4191> person.<WH5315>

'He shall not make<WH2930> himself unclean<WH2930> for his father or for his mother,<WH1> for his brother<WH517> or for his sister,<WH251> when they die,<WH269> because<WH4194> his separation<WH3588> to God<WH5145> is on his head.<WH430>
'All<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> he is holy<WH6918> to the Lord.<WH3068>

'But if<WH3588> a man dies<WH4191> very<WH6621> suddenly<WH6597> beside<WH5921> him and he defiles<WH2930> his dedicated<WH5145> head<WH7218> [of hair,] then he shall shave<WH1548> his head<WH7218> on the day<WH3117> when he becomes<WH2893> clean;<WH2893> he shall shave<WH1548> it on the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>

'Then on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> he shall bring<WH935> two<WH8147> turtledoves<WH8449> or<WH176> two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons<WH3123> to the priest,<WH3548> to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>

'And the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> one<WH259> for a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and [the] other<WH259> for a burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH5930> and make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for him concerning<WH4480> <WH834> his sin<WH2398> because<WH5921> of the [dead] person.<WH5315> And that same<WH1931> day<WH3117> he shall consecrate<WH6942> his head,<WH7218>

and shall dedicate<WH9320> to the Lord<WH3068> his days<WH3117> as a Nazirite,<WH5145> and shall bring<WH935> a male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> a year<WH8141> old<WH1121> for a guilt<WH817> offering;<WH817> but the former<WH7223> days<WH3117> shall be void<WH5307> because<WH3588> his separation<WH5145> was defiled.<WH2930>

'Now this<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> of the Nazirite<WH5139> when<WH3117> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> are fulfilled,<WH4390> he shall bring<WH935> the offering to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>

'And he shall present<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> to the Lord:<WH3068> one<WH259> male<WH3532> lamb<WH3532> a year<WH8141> old<WH1121> without<WH8549> defect<WH8549> for a burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> and one<WH259> ewe-lamb a year<WH8141> old<WH1323> without<WH8549> defect<WH8549> for a sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and one<WH259> ram<WH352> without<WH8549> defect<WH8549> for a peace<WH8002> offering,<WH8002>

and a basket<WH5536> of unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> of fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil<WH8081> and unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> spread<WH4886> with oil,<WH8081> along with their grain offering<WH4503> and their libations.<WH5262>
'Then the priest<WH3548> shall present<WH7126> [them] before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> and shall offer<WH6213> his sin<WH9128> offering<WH9128> and his burnt<WH5930> offering.<WH5930>

'He shall also offer<WH6213> the ram<WH352> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> to the Lord,<WH3068> together<WH5921> with the basket<WH5536> of unleavened<WH4682> cakes;<WH4682> the priest<WH3548> shall likewise offer<WH6213> its grain offering<WH4503> and its libation.<WH5262>

'The Nazirite<WH5139> shall then shave<WH1548> his dedicated<WH5145> head<WH7218> [of hair<WH8181>] at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and take<WH3947> the dedicated<WH5145> hair of his head<WH7218> and put<WH5414> [it] on the fire<WH784> which<WH834> is under<WH8478> the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings.<WH8002>

'And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the ram's shoulder<WH2220> [when it has been] boiled,<WH1311> and one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> cake<WH2471> out of the basket,<WH5536> and one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> wafer,<WH7550> and shall put<WH5414> [them] on the hands<WH3709> of the Nazirite<WH5139> after<WH310> he has shaved<WH1548> his dedicated<WH5145> [hair].

'Then the priest<WH3548> shall wave<WH5130> them for a wave<WH8573> offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068> It is holy<WH6944> for the priest,<WH3548> together<WH5921> with the breast<WH2373> offered<WH8573> by waving<WH8573> and the thigh<WH7785> offered<WH8641> by lifting<WH8641> up; and afterward<WH310> the Nazirite<WH5139> may drink<WH8354> wine.<WH3196> '

"This<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> of the Nazirite<WH5139> who<WH834> vows<WH5087> his offering<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068> according<WH5921> to his separation,<WH5145> in addition<WH4480> <WH905> to what<WH834> [else] he can afford<WH5381>;<WH3027> according to his vow<WH5087> which<WH834> he takes,<WH5087> so<WH3651> he shall do<WH6213> according<WH5921> to the law<WH8451> of his separation.<WH5145>"
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> you shall bless<WH1288> the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> You shall say<WH559> to them:
The Lord<WH3068> bless<WH1288> you, and keep<WH8104> you;
The Lord<WH3068> make<WH215> His face<WH6440> shine<WH215> on you, And be gracious<WH2603> to you;
The Lord<WH3068> lift<WH5375> up His countenance<WH6440> on you, And give<WH7760> you peace.<WH7965>'
"So they shall invoke<WH7760> My name<WH8034> on the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and I then will bless<WH1288> them."
